text: Hey folks, I recall a presentation by a HubSpot developer on building a little app within the HubSpot stack. It wasn’t something that was for publishing to the marketplace, but rather an app that is unique to an org. Does anyone remember that presentation? It may have been at Inbound from last year…

Hey guys, also asked this in the Shopify devs slack but figured this might be a more relevant place to ask. We develop for Shopify and our customers are Shopify merchants.

Does anyone sync their Shopify install data to HubSpot? It would be good to have merchant data automatically pulled into HubSpot for marketing emails - it looks like most of the Shopify + HubSpot integrations are for the merchant (getting consumer data into HubSpot), not the developer. Anyone have any luck with this?
Hey Legends, has any of you legends implemented HubSpot tracking cookies in iOS or android app?

Hey <@U02BS7SRUHL>

Would you please explain the term? `install_data` In little more details as to what exactly should get synced from Shopify to HubSpot.

Hi all, i really need some help
Has anyone managed to make a custom login logout, membership section with hubdb and custom code?
